content.detailedDescription: On 1/15/2017 at 1:15pm, i was driving right outside of cookport pa when i noticed a huge completely round hole through cloud cover in the sky. there was a visible cloud trail up through the hole as if something huge just went right up through it. i stopped, took some photos, and also noticed that everything was completely silent. too silent. no sounds of any kind whatsoever. also as i began to drive off i saw a relatively large black helicopter flying right by the hole. i unfortunately didn't get a photo of the helicopter.
content.summary: Perfectly round hole in sky with clouds swept up through the opening. black helicopter after sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw what was probably the first ufo of 2017 in my time zone. exactly at the stroke of midnight on new year's, i stepped outside to make a wish for the year on sirius, the brightest star in the sky. it's a whimsical tradition i've had for decades. as soon as i made my wish, a ufo appeared out of nowhere, about 1/2 inch at arm's length, directly to the left of sirius. sirius was directly to the south of me, as my house faces in that direction. 

the ufo was 3 very bright, white star-like lights in a row, perfectly spaced, like orion's belt. the distance from the first star to the last was about 1/2 inch at arm's length. the lights traveled silently, single file, in a northward direction until they passed beyond the roof line of the house. the sighting lasted approximately 4 seconds. 

i could not tell if it was 3 lights on a single craft, or if it was 3 separate craft flying in formation one behind the other. one thing i do know for sure is that it was a great way to start the year!
content.summary: Saw 3 star-like lights in a row moving from s to n passing overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened 14 years ago but i think about it every day. back in the summer of 2003 i worked for a hospital in columbus, ohio which is about 18 or so miles from my home. i could set my own schedule as i did not work directly with patients. i worked late afternoon to midnight or 1:00am so i could be home during the day with my child who was out of school for the summer (my husband worked during the day). i was driving home and it was after 1:00am, it was a nice summer evening with a very clear sky and i had my driver's side window down partially. as i drove along, about two miles from my home in a rural area, i looked to my left and was stunned at what i saw. there, hovering about 10ft or so above the trees next to the road, was a disc shaped ufo. it was bright, illuminated from within, with a row of lights around the middle and a dome on the top. i slowed my car way down, was almost at a complete stop as there was no one else on the road at the time. i could not believe what i was seeing, i was absolutely gobsmacked. i rolled my window all the way down and there was nothing but silence (not even crickets and on a summer night in rural ohio that is unheard of). it was maybe as wide across as a house and wasn't a thin disc, it was just disc shaped. after observing it for a minute or so, i became afraid. i knew that it's occupants had to see me and i felt very uneasy. i drove on and told myself to just breathe. as i was about half a mile from it, coming the other way at top speed with his lights flashing (no siren) was a police car. i thought of turning around but didn't.
 i've told this to maybe three people since then. i've just now felt comfortable writing it here, i'm amazed at all the reports here, i'm glad i'm not alone in what i saw and no one here would think i'm crazy. i never gave much thought to ufo's before but i think about them all the time now, i think about that craft every single day. strange things have happened to me throughout my life,things that i cannot explain, but this one is at the top of the list.  

sorry this is so long, thanks for reading. peace.
content.summary: Glowing disc shaped ufo hovering above trees.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were returning from a late night coffee trip around 145 in the morning,we were talking about cars and automotive things when a bright  glowing blue  sphere light splash  over my shoulder, i seen the light come into  over the view of the front of the car and pause in the sky for about five seconds it was a bluish white light in the shape of a ball about the size of a car  and it had two weird kind of protrusions coming from the side that i could see  it was  at about a 45Â° angle up to the right-hand side of the front of the car my friend in the car who is driving said look a shooting star but i said no stars don't stop in the middle of a flights do when  he thought about it he agreed with me, when the ball of light took off again it looked like space kind of scrunched up distorting the area around it  and then with slingshot it forward at like a huge speed but it left light a line of light  i've never moved seen anything move that fast in real life  in the movies yes but never in real life
content.summary: It was a sphere with glowy white blue light too weird protrusions coming from the backside

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at night on front porch. i was looking up at the sky when what appeared to be a huge chevron shaped craft moved in a straight line across the sky and disappear behind the treeline out of sight. illuminated behind by the moon. no lights, no sound. no time to go in and get camera. i knew i was seeing a ufo. i sat and watched and could not believe what i was witnessing. i sat there for a few minutes after trying to get my head around what i had just seen. i still remember it today as if it was yesterday. an amazing site. my friends laugh but i know what i saw. patricia
content.summary: Passed over me in the night sky. chevron shape. no sound. straight, steady path.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a cold and clear starlit night in the winter of 1976.  i lived out in the wide open cattle country of nebraska where there are no street lights, so if itâs clear you can see millions of stars.

i was a senior in high school and was ready to drive into town to play in a basketball game on friday night.  i was driving my fatherâs truck.  when i pulled onto the main highway (i was the only vehicle on the road at that point), i immediately noticed a craft just over 1/2 mile ahead that was hovering about 20 ft. above the ground on the north side of the highway.  it was shining these huge and powerful spotlights down along the river meadow where the cattle would graze in the winter time.  the craft had a red light on the front (the end the spotlights were shining from), and a green light on the opposite end.  neither the red nor green lights were flashing at that point.

within just a few seconds, as my headlights shown down the highway toward the craft, the craft rotated and shined those powerful spotlights at me.  they were so strong they lit up the front of the truck from about 1/2 mile away.  i know this distance because there is a big curve in the highway at the point from where i was, and the craft was hovering right next to that curve.  the spotlights appeared to be about 4 â 5 ft. apart.  it shined those lights at me for just a few seconds, then slowly rotated back with the lights shining back toward the meadow and the craft slowly started moving across the highway and down over the meadow.  

i noticed as soon as the craft moved, the red and green lights started slowly flashing.  it moved across the meadow toward the river which was only around 300 yards away at that point.  the thing i noticed right away was that there was no sound.  out in the vast country like this, you can hear a sound for miles, but nothing.  it gradually picked up speed as it approached the river which runs west to east along the highway.  it turned off the spotlights as it crossed the meadow, but the red and green lights kept flashing, and they would increase the speed of the flash as the craft increased in speed.

at the point the craft moved above the river, i was at the curve in the highway where i first saw it hover, and i was speeding up continually trying to get closer.  i was only maybe 400 yards away at that point, and the craft turned and followed the river, just above the tree line.  it was amazing how this craft just cruised along above the river at such a slow pace and no sound.  i was fixated on the craft as i kept driving faster.  it went along the river for about another mile and then stopped on the south side of the river.  at that point the red and green lights stopped flashing as it hovered.  i had caught up with it and i pulled off the south side of the highway next to it.  at that point i had my windows in the truck down to try and hear some sound, even though it was freezing out, but there was no sound and i was only around 100 yards away from the craft as it hovered about 40 ft. above the ground.

the craft appeared to be about 30 feet in diameter.  it was dark in color, but again there are no street lights out there, and it was a dark starlit night, so that may have made it appear darker in color than it actually was.  there seemed to be some faint white lights along the edge of the craft, evenly spaced from the green light to the red light.  i wanted an even better look, so i was going to get out of the truck.  i had to wait for a minute because there was another vehicle coming down the highway, from east to west (they had to have seen it too), and i waited for it to pass before opening my door.

as i opened the truck door, the dome light in the truck came on, and immediately the craft started moving in the opposite direction from which it came (back to the west).  as it started to move, the red and green lights started flashing again slowly.  i turned the truck around as fast as i could as started following it back in the west direction.  i noticed the craft start to accelerate gradually as i did as well.  it was still just above the tree tops and the river.  as it sped up, the red and green lights flashed faster and faster.  the dim white lights along the edge seemed to start flashing as well.  

i had chased after it about a mile and it continued to accelerate.  i glanced down at my speedometer and i was doing over 90 mph at that point.  i still had my windows down in the freezing air, and there was not a single sound from the craft, which was only a couple hundred yards away.  i was just approaching that curve in the highway where i originally saw it hovering for the first time, and all of a sudden, this craft accelerated at a tremendous speed as it angled up about 40 degrees in a southwest direction.  the red, green, and now white lights were flashing at a very fast pace as it accelerated off towards the stars.  within 5 seconds, it was so far away it was out of sight.  again, absolutely no sound as it accelerated to this tremendous speed.

the distance it had to travel to be out of sight within a few seconds is unbelievable.  it was a clear starlit night, and you can see for a long way when itâs like that.  we can even see satelliteâs orbit on clear nights like this, and they are hundreds of miles up.  there are no military bases anywhere close to this area.  this is in the middle of nebraska.  what is called the sandhillâs region.  the closest military base would probably be colorado springs, and that about a 7 or 8 hour drive from this location.

there have been cattle mutilations is this area where i saw the craft.  in fact there was one cow that was found around this time frame, about 3 miles east of where i saw the ufo.  no blood, no tracks lead up to the cow, and organs cut out.  i suspect this ufo was hunting cattle with those huge spotlights when i first saw it.  again, it was panning the river meadow/pasture where cattle are kept during the winter time.  guess i just happened to get in the way of their search for cattle.

after the ufo was out of sight, i drove right back to the house and told my parents i just saw a ufo.  obviously i was excited and they said my eyes were very big.  i sat on the couch for a while to calm down.  this was back in 1976.  there is no way we had craft that would even come close to what this thing could do, and iâm sure to this day, we still donât.  this thing defied the laws of physics.  there is now way a craft can hover like that, move that slow, and accelerate that fast, without any sound.  to this day, i still remember this as if it happened yesterday, and this was over 40 years ago.  i did not tell anyone else about this for over 30 years, but now that more people believe, i am willing to tell the story.  what an amazing experience to have.  i feel lucky to have been in the right place at the right time.  this was not some light in the sky, this was a close encounter and i will never forget it. 

sorry the story is so long, but thatâs the only way i could tell this like it happened.  i hope others will get the chance to see a ufo in their life time.  

thanks for taking your time to read this.
content.summary: Ufo with large spotlights in nebraska cattle country - 1976

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 9:10 pm, central time, my daughter went outside to walk two friends home after a birthday party and came running back into the house to tell me there were meteors falling.  they had already observed several.  i went outside and saw about 4-5 bright orange lights traveling from the south-southeast horizon traveling north-northeast.  as they got closer to being right above us (at a very high altitude), they seemed to fade out and disappear - almost as if they were fireballs that had burned themselves out.  however, after they had seemed to extinguish, we saw them reappear in the sky behind us to the north-northeast and they seemed to accelerate in speed at that point.  they did not have a trail behind them and we heard no sound.  my daughter observed several groupings of them in total - they had already observed a group before she came inside to tell me and in the first group they saw, she said that one diverged from the path and went upwards.  one of the last ones to pass seemed to explode or break apart and it looked like something fell from it.  minutes after we thought the even was over and were about to go back inside, another one appeared - all by itself and traveled steadily on the same path and then disappeared above us.
content.summary: We observed multiple orange fireball looking objects travel through the sky at a high altitude from the eouth-southeast to the north-northwest.

content.detailedDescription:
Between 2010 and 2012, maybe.  mayport, fl.  late at night.  past 2200.  look up at night sky, see part of sky looks odd.  triangular in shape, black, but different from the sky.  single white light, steady, at each of the corners.  moved too slowly to be any aircraft i've ever seen, even at a terribly high altitude.  if it was terribly high, then it must have been a few football fields from tip to tip.  if it was lower, in the range of a plane during takeoff, it would have been regular, maybe even smaller than normal commercial aircraft.  difficult to tell, as was a rather dark night.

was maybe spring or fall...Comfortable time of year. 

apologies no better details, long time ago.  saw on discovery channel that other people have seen triangular things that "float".  this thing moved far too slowly to be anything i had or have ever seen since.  i spoke with another sailor who was topside with me, pointed it out to him/her.  i can't even recall who it was, but he/she did see it, as well, so i was not imagining it.
content.summary: Dark triangle in sky, white light at each corner, moved too slow to be plane.

content.detailedDescription: Was in my room looking out my window towards howick/pakuranga in auckland. when i saw a star like craft in the night sky in which it was a clear night. thought it was a star at first but saw that it had blue and white lights. but after watching for ages i saw it start to move so i grabbed my phone and took a photo or two. so i zoomed in to see a star shape object with a beam/ some kind of flare off the back of it. until it just poof dissapered.
content.summary: Was looking out my window seeing a star like object with lights stationary in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was november 23,2016
i was walking my dog and was looking at the sky trying to see the moon and stars.I found the moon then all of a sudden a reddish/orange object was coming toward me at a fast rate of speed.I noticed that is was about as high as our 2 story townhouse.It flew almost above my head as i was follwing it with my eyes.It looked like a toy rocket you shoot up in the air with pressure.Only it was flyng horizontal and left a trail of what looked like flames as i fllowed it as it passed over my head.It flew straight for these tall trees and when it got close to the trees it accelerated and flew above the trees and disapeared.I was like did i really see that.I was like omg that was a ufo but it was small.I know it was not a drone.It was missiled shaped and flew way too fast.It also let the flame trail.I also noticed it seemed to glow reddish/orange and the flames were yellowish.
are you aware of small size ufo'?
i seemed to have a dream of small aliens landing the missle and exiting the ufo later that night.
this is not the first time i have seen a ufo
i will make another report about seeing ufo's with multiple witnesses with me in cancun mexico
content.summary: Looked like a rocket about 2-3 ft long and apprx 6inch rd

content.detailedDescription: Went outside for a smoke. noticed bright light hovering over chino hills.   2 planes approached and the object just shot straight up into the sky. crazy
content.summary: Star like object to low to be a star

content.detailedDescription: A bunch of lights flickering in the shape of what appeared to be in the shape of a plane. the lights moved and changed it shape frequently.
content.summary: A bunch of lights flickering in the shape of what appeared to be in the shape of a plane. the lights moved and changed it shape frequently.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1973 i was 6 years old, (i know the year from other family events) 
one brilliant summers day, there was a clear blue sky, no clouds, i was playing in the garden on my own when something caught my eye. it was a cut diamond shaped object wich was glistening in the sun.
i used to build model plastic planes as a young kid and knew it was nothing like i had ever seen before. so i stood watching it for quite some time. it appeared to just hang in the sky just left of the bright midday sun. i studied it and every now and then it flashed in the sun. it appeared to be a solid chrome metal thing that sat motionless in the sky. after quite some time i ran into the house with the intention of getting my father out to look at it as i was puzzled to what it was, but my dad was talking to my mum at the time and told me to be quiet. so i ran back out to the garden again and it was still there. 
as i looked at it , it was about 12 inches to the left of the sun still reflecting off the sun. anyway as i was watching it, it just vanished in a blink of an eye. 
i thought at the time that it must have traveled behind the sun as i couldn't see where else it could have gone to.
later in life as i am now i think maybe it was possibly hiding behind the sun, but of course this sentance alone is just speculation.
content.summary: Chrome, cut diamond like, highly reflective surfaces, glinting in the sun light.

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to make my dog jump into the air to get an action shot of her, i do this often & end up with alot of dud photos. i was about to delete this off my camera when i noticed what looks like a large rock in the sky with a blue glow. i did not see this with my naked eye but wish i had so i could have zoomed in on it!
content.summary: I did not see this in person, it wasn't until i looked through my photos i saw it. must have disappeared quick as the next pic of same sky didn't have it (20secs later)

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside with 2 people. i saw it hovering under the clouds over my head with no sound. it looked like the constellation ursa major (big dipper) however it was under the clouds. lower than planes fly. we called my father outside because he was in the us air force. (he had never seen anything like it and had no clue as to what it could be.) it moved nw slowly. and changed formation slowly and changed direction and went sw. the lights were extremely bright like stars but had no sound. we live in the flight path of 3 different airports so we are used to planes flying all day and night. and the planes that fly as low as the ufo are extremely loud and vibrate our house. these had no vibration and no sound even though they were lower than planes. after changing formation they ascended up into the clouds and kept ascending until they became invisible to the naked eye. a couple of the lights spanned out separated from the rest then those two or three lights went more north while the others went more s sw and they all disappeared. all four people that were there were adults, we were not drinking or doing any drugs or anything like that.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I witnessed this with 3 other people. 8 star like things hovered over my head, but under the clouds right over our house. they looked like orions belt under the clouds. they moved slowly and hovered at times while changing shape.

content.detailedDescription: Watched two orb like objects moving in ways that we on earth cannot in my back yard with my friend and went to the field it was hovering over and saw a perfect circle  of dead grass ,the entire field is frozen except the one spot where the cirlce is,i nd soembody to talk to about this i was not a beiliver but this is so real i almost urinated myself and im 280 lb a 27 yr old man and i cried and ran inside like a toddler last night..Please can u help me try to figure this out so i dont feel like im insane..Thanks and i hope to hear from you ps circle in the field is still there and have pictires but not on my phone..I rly wna talk to somebody please get at me 5188020695
content.summary: Me and a friend saw two orb like crafts above the field behind my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a plane at the omaha airport when i looked out the window and saw this object. at first i thought it might be a hot air balloon in the shape of a black square, but then i thought to myself, "what on earth would a hot air balloon be doing floating over the airstrip of the omaha airport!?

maybe this is blindingly obvious to you guys and you can debunk it easily. but i don't know what it is, so i thought i would share it.

thanks,

keith
content.summary: Square black object over the omaha airport in 2014

content.detailedDescription:
Standing out back i noticed what appeared to be a very small light at the end of a periscope-looking thing. the periscope (rod/pole) was maybe a foot high, looked to be silver and was seated in the dirt about 2 feet from the tree where i originally saw the domed light disappear into the crotch of a tree at ground level, and the being returning to the domed light that spotted me.

this light - was extremely bright, but small - certainly less than an inch in diameter and was fixed ...In other words it did not move. it appeared to be a beacon or marker. i stood and observed it for approximately 5 minutes - being very still. i quietly went back inside to grab my camera - but when i returned it was gone.

i hung around on my deck to see if it, or the being i'd seen some years ago would show itself, but could see or hear nothing.

unlike my 1st experience with the being and the domed light some years ago i was very calm, not nervous and was careful to listen for any sound, notice any movement etc.

this beacon has not been there since....
content.summary: Saw a small beacon come out of the ground by the tree of my last report (45801)about 32 feet away from me.

content.detailedDescription:
this video presents real flying spacecraft. captured during my usual drive from my town to dublin.
thanks for yours time 
witold ligezowski
content.summary: Triangular extraterrestrial  ship on the  dublin highway

content.detailedDescription: This was just seem on a picture i took out the airplane window and noticed while i was looking at pictures. i never saw this other than in my photos.
content.summary: Noticed in picture taken out airplane window.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is luis, i am 19 years old and i have witnessed what appear to be two cases of ufo sightings in the xochimilco delegation in mexico city, mexico. it was around 1:30 p.M., already on the 26th, when by chance i turned to the sky and noticed a very strange object, with red lights that parted and when i continued looking in the sky i gave another similar object. my family and i were watching them about 5 minutes from a low point. he discarded that they are drones since they make noise, and being very late night was not heard at all, besides, i do not think there are commercial drones of that size and shape. nor are balloons of cantoya due to the movements that made.

you see, when we decided to go to a higher point, already fully discovered these two objects began to behave differently! one of them went away and i was able to take pictures, one is from the front of the object, the other is from the back and take it when it was already moving towards the west. the odd thing happened with the other object, since in the blink of an eye totally turned off its lights, something a dron can not do while it is still in flight. this low object, looked perfectly fine, was black, but thanks to the sky a little cloudy could see their movements! the object underneath completely, and in the zone where we saw it go down is an area of ​​the channel of xochimilco, totally alone and without light.
in recent months there have been several cases like this, but none is like the last.
sorry for my english, is not the best.
content.summary: Two ufo's in xochimilco, mexico city.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming back home in the car with family members when i spotted something hovering in the sky, at first i didn't make anything of it but then we got closer to it as we were driving and it seemed to have two bright white lights close together beaming with red and orange flashing lights on the right side with blue and orange flashing lights on the other. three of us managed to look at the object and we could see it was a triangular shape, it seemed to have a ribbed effect underneath. i saw it for approx 2-3 minutes and then we turned down a different road only to see again but then it disappeared. i asked my family member to draw a quick sketch, this person is a non believer, knows nothing about ufo and came up with the drawing i have attached. if anybody else witnessed this in the stourport/kidderminster area please post about it.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object hovering above.

content.detailedDescription: I was up at night doing my studies during midnight. my study table is basically facing the window and then i saw a bright light, like a very bright light came to my building. it didn't seem to be originated from a particular source or from any buildings. the light was like an orb that came up at midnight. when i saw it i got shocked and basically that shock kind of pulled me down to the ground. i don't know whether it was the doing of the orb or it just a sudden reaction but it was scary. the orb was blinking very bright and it was very close. it was closer than 20 feet.
content.summary: It was a very bright light of yellow light that just came out of no where. it happened in midnight

content.detailedDescription:
We flew to the yukon territory from san francisco to try to film the aurora borialis.There we're a few clouds.
my wife was doing timed shots leaving the shutter open for 8 seconds.
she said there was nothing seen in the air but this turned up on her pic.
if you look closely you can see a halo of sorts in the pic. also if you look in the background you can see the big dipper.
we are stumped as to what it is. any help is welcome.
content.summary: My wife and i came to see the auora borialis. while having the shutter open for 8 seconds this is what we got.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving southbound from hwy 6 going towards bellmead texas coming from falls county to get something to eat in the shopping center that is located by the walmart and interstate 35. we were on the outskirts of the city of bellmead still considered the country. when we spotted a good size moving object that was bright with three bright lights from underneath it and it seemed to hover and then seemed to be following alongside of us well in bellmead off of hwy 7 also known as loop 340. it finally circled around and went back into the sky line as it dimmed it's lights after it did a circle and shot off very fast but the lights under the ship faded out as it turned to go back upwards into the sky line. we both were shocked and just knew that it was not a helicopter or airplane or even someone's drone. it was the real thing and we were surprised to get the chance to see it up close and very personal for us. i first noticed the object because of my eye sight was catching the strange craft as it seemed to keep a distance from us but certainly was very impressive till it decided to go back up and do something else and sped off very fast.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangle shaped perfectly spaced with three white brighten lights solid and fast ufo observed

content.detailedDescription:
I had been shopping and i was sitting in my car getting prepared to leave the shopping center when i noticed how interesting the sky looked with all the activities going on like the sun, it's rays,storm clouds,jets/airplanes , and jet streams. so i decided to take some photographs. then i left to return home.
i didn't notice the orb until the following day. therefore, i don't know anything more than the fact that it was there.
content.summary: Green orb

content.detailedDescription: I was at pete and dollys tavern in new windsor ny  pete the tavern owner went out the front door and called me,,he was excited,,,i went to see what was up and we saw this big object,,actua;lly just lights in a long rectangular shape,,,it wasnt going to fast,,,maybe 100 mph or less,,it got closser and started to turn right,,,to the west,,,this thing had been reported up and down the hudson river for a while,,,,anyway thats when about half way through their right turn they  got screwwed up and lost formation and sort of broke formation ,,,then i could hear their engines,,,sounded like4 cylinder lycoming,,continental light plane engines,,,,it was definitly a faily large bunch of smalllightplanes flying in a close formation,,,,my cousin had told me about the big ufo he had seen in tomkins cove over the river a few weeks before,  im reporting this just to show how some guys will try to fool people,,,,im a pilot with 1000 hours in light  planes,,,j3 cubs and me 450 pratt powered stearman biplane so im very fermiler with like planes and their engine sounds,,,,we did get fuzzy views of a few of the planes in the dark,,probably because of ground lights,,,,i do have to hand it to them for their nerve flying in thedark without wing lights in formation,,,,the other reports i made were real ufos,,,but i just had to report the one fake ufo i saw,,,,,i went back in and had a few more beers then went out in my big kenworth sleeper cab truck and went to sleep;;;;;better that a dwi,,,,
content.summary: Saw what looked like a hugh rectangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
While watching the nasa program on tv, i noticed what appeared to be a ufo travelling at an incredible speed as the iss  viewed the earth below.  when i noticed this small object on my tv screen, i recorded it.  it definitely had to be a large object to be seen from the iss, and appeared to be travelling in the same direction as the iss.  it was not a shadow nor reflection from the iss.  i lost sight of the object when the program switched to something else.  

(note: i believe a mufon individual resides in fort worth, texas, to whom i be happy to show this recording.)
content.summary: While observing a view of the earth from the iss, i noticed there appeared to be a ufo travelling at an incredible speed in the same direction as the iss.  i recorded this event on my dvr.
